resources.string: Enter distance from object and select the\ncorrect units

This app allows you to determine the height of any object by using your distance from object and the angles recorded when you point your phone at the starting and ending points of the object or its trajectory.

How to record measurements:
1.Point the long side of your phone at the bottom of the object
2.Tap the square once
3.Point phone at top of object and tap again
Return to home and calculate using a new distance
